prompt:
Nurse: That's excellent, Mr. Delarosa. Regular weight checks are a good way to monitor your health. Lastly, have you been using more pillows at night to sleep?

Patient: No. I haven't.

Nurse: That's good to hear, Mr. Delarosa. We just performed a simple CHF assessment. It's a good idea to do this at home every day. I understand that keeping track of symptoms can be a bit complicated. Do you have any questions about how to do so?

Patient: No.

Nurse: I apologize for the confusion earlier, Mr. Delarosa. I thought you said you were using more pillows to sleep. Could you please confirm whether this is correct?

Patient: I don't know why you think that. I I'm not using any. I

Nurse: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you. Hold on a second while I figure out how I can best support you.

Patient: said no.

responses.gpt4: I'm sorry for the misunderstanding, Mr. Delarosa. To clarify, you're currently not using more pillows to sleep, correct?
responses.our_model: Thank you for clarifying, Mr. Delarosa. I apologize for the confusion earlier. Now, let's talk about your diet. Could you tell me about some of the meals you've had recently?
